The First Aerial Melody of the Desire Realm: The Demon King’s name is Yumo.
The human path is distant and faint, the immortal path vast and boundless.
The ghostly path delights—yet it is the Gate of Human Life.
The heavenly path treasures life, the ghostly path treasures death.
The immortal path is ever auspicious, the ghostly path ever inauspicious.
The lofty, pure, and numinous soar, their mournful songs resounding through the great void.
I only wish the immortal path to flourish, not the human path to wither.
In the Northern Capital’s Yellow Springs and Crooked Mansion, a myriad ghosts gather,
All seeking to cut short human destiny, to sever the Gate of Human Life.
Ah! Sing the Cavern’s Hymns to subdue the Northern Feng of Luo.
Before dispatching the demonic spirits, sever the blades of the Six Ghosts.
The qi of the myriad heavens surges boundlessly—my Dao daily ascends in glory.

The Second Melody of the Form Realm’s Demon King: The Demon King’s name is Moluo.
Lofty and expansive, luminous qi spreads in all four directions,
The Brahma-conduct of the heavens encircles the ten directions.
The boundless great spirits all arise from my body.
I possess the Cavern’s Hymns—recite them ten thousand times to attain immortality.
The immortal path values deliverance, the ghostly path clings to it.
Heaven and earth stretch vast and dim, foul qi swirls thickly.
The Three Realms delight—pass beyond them to abide forever.
Cross my realm, and your body enters spontaneity.
At this moment of joy, how slight is my grace!
The Dragon Han eon surges boundlessly—how can one distinguish the true?
My realm is hard to cross, so I compose the Cavern’s Scriptures.
Transforming and soaring through the void, I test your body.
Success or failure, slackening or retreat—how few are those who cross!
Laughing at those who fail to cross, I sing this melody.

The Third Melody of the Formless Realm’s Demon King: The Demon King’s name is Shao.
Above the Three Realms, the vast and distant Great Luo,
Beyond the roots of form, clouds layer in towering peaks.
Only the Primordial Beginning dwells in the House of Vast Kalpas.
My realm is ordered and governed, inheriting the Mysterious Capital.
Those who transgress my realm enter the Jade Void.
I, the supreme king, rectify and command the host of demons.
Ten thousand transformations in the void, foul qi blooms in profusion.
Few preserve the true—many are deluded.
The immortal path is hard to secure, the ghostly path easy to stray.
The human path lies in the heart—truly, it does not depend on others.
The immortal path values substance, the human path values splendor.
If you do not delight in the immortal path, how can you pass the Three Realms?
Should you wish to turn the Five Paths, what can I do for you?

Above these Three Realms, amidst the soaring void,
The demon kings’ melodies harmonize with the Cavern’s Hymns.
Recite them a hundred times, and your name ascends to the Southern Palace;
A thousand times, and the demon kings safeguard and welcome you;
Ten thousand times, the Dao is perfected, and you soar into the great void.
Crossing the Three Realms, you ascend to the rank of Immortal Elder.
Those who hear the numinous melodies—the demon kings show reverence in form.
They command the earth spirits,
Issuing talismans to command the earth spirits,
Escorting and welcoming, delivering from the earthly prisons,
Rescuing from the Five Sufferings and Eight Hardships, raising the seven generations of ancestors,
Forever departing the ghostly bureaus.
The soul crosses the Vermilion Mound, undergoes refinement, and is reborn—
This is called boundless deliverance, universal salvation without end.

There are secret celestial texts, revered by all heavens.
Those who leak or slight them fall into hell, their misfortune extending to the seven generations of ancestors.

Recite the Cavern’s Hymns—
The Vermilion and Yellow of Tortoise Mountain, the Flying Mystery of the Purple Script—
This is the true text of the Cavern’s Hymns, the very one the Form Realm’s Demon King called "my Cavern’s Hymns."
The Flying Mystery’s purple qi congeals the numinous root,
The net of Jade Numinosity binds the myriad spirits.
In the void, it seethes and coalesces naturally,
Above, twelve layered mounds transmit it.
Jade towers towering, radiant with luminous clouds,
Flowing essence in the purple watchtowers, girded with golden chariots.
Resplendent jasper terraces encircled by eight soaring qi,
Within dwell the Nine Numinous Immortals of Azure Gold.
The Vermilion and Yellow True Mother is called Jingyan,
Wearing a flying azure feathered robe and a morning infant’s crown.
In her left hand, she holds a jade scepter and grasps the numinous banner,
The Five-Colored Life Demon faces the Imperial Honored One.
Holding the talismanic registers before the Gate of Life,
She chews the sun and moon, sips the Jade Spring.
Radiance from Li and Luo refines the five souls,
Internally full, externally overflowing, the Crimson Talisman rejoices.
Golden light shines brilliantly, the form perfectly round,
From the new moon it enters the golden hue, turbid and indistinct.
Only the Enlightened One understands these words,
The fifth day of the fifth month, the essence of the Northern Origin.
Carved and seen, the Flowery Canopy leads the Immortal Lords,
Purple qi swirls leftward, linking with the Dipper.
Passing through the twenty-eight lunar lodges to enter the Golden Gate—
This is where the Vermilion Emperor reviews the myriad immortals.
Those who clearly understand this secret and apply diligent effort,
Unfolding their forms and contemplating deeply, always discerning,
Will perceive the wondrous scenes and attain the essential text.
In three years, they will surely secure long life.
In nine years, they will ride the void, donning feathered skirts,
Lightly soaring in phoenix robes to ascend Dragon Mountain.
Looking up and down, they pay homage to the Nine Numinous Ones and the Jade Dawn,
Merging with spontaneity to pay court to the Highest Clarity.

Cultivate this Dao in the first, second, third, fourth, sixth, seventh, eighth, ninth, eleventh, and twelfth months—
Ten months in a year.
On the third, fifth, ninth, fifteenth, and twenty-fifth days of each month—
Five times a month—
Purify and fast, reciting the Mystery Text once.
After midnight, step into the central courtyard, gaze upward, and contemplate the Flowery Canopy within the Northern Dipper,
Where purple cloud qi emerges from the Dipper, swirling leftward,
Passing through the twenty-eight lunar lodges to return above the Golden Gate.
If among humans the sky is overcast and lightless,
Contemplate within the chamber as prescribed, ensuring clarity.
After contemplation, bow four times to the purple cloud at heart,
Knock the teeth three times, and intone while gazing upward:
*"The night sky is bright and clear, the hidden and void reveal the true.
Flowing clouds linger, golden blossoms bestow their grace.
The Vermilion Emperor spreads his radiance, numinous flight in the purple chariot.
This evening unfolds, Azure Gold receives the immortals.
Fulfill my lofty wish, may my body accord with spontaneity.
Bind the life to the moon’s essence, safeguard the years and days’ root.
The Three Numinous Ones merge with the scene, forever abiding on Dragon Mountain.
In the secret night, pure and unveiled, I request as spoken."*
Finish, then knock the teeth, drawing in purple qi twenty-eight times before stopping.

Practice this for three years, and there will be signs of divine descent upon your sleeping mat.
Your body will be enveloped in purple qi, a single form interwoven with light,
Your name inscribed in the Nine Heavens—you will surely attain the rank of Highest Immortal.
When purple cloud qi appears in the heavens,
Drying the sun and moon, dividing the five stars,
In the lands of their directions, there will be those who unite with the Dao.

Whenever such calamities arise, those of shared qi must unite in heart to perform purification rites, burn incense in the six periods of the day, and recite the scriptures ten times over—whereupon virtue and power descend at once, dispelling all inauspicious omens. These boundless texts universally deliver limitless beings.

The Dao says: Those of shallow learning in the Way, or whose immortal rank remains unfulfilled, when their destined time of passing arrives, shall traverse the Great Yin. At the hour of their departure, fellow perfected ones of shared learning shall burn incense and recite the scriptures ten times, thereby delivering the bodily form according to the proper method. The hun-soul shall ascend directly to the Southern Palace, where, in accordance with the merit of their practice, they shall be reborn after a reckoning of days. Having thus transmigrated without annihilation, they shall attain the immortals’ ranks.

The Dao says: When the revolutions of heaven and earth reach their end, one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures. When the stellar lodges fall into disarray and the sun and moon lose their proper course, one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures. When the four seasons lose their order and yin and yang fall out of harmony, one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures. When the sovereign faces calamity and warfare erupts on all sides, one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures. When pestilence spreads and the multitudes perish, one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures. When a teacher or companion passes from this life, one must perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures.

For the merit of purification rites and scripture recitation is most weighty: above, it dissolves heavenly calamities and safeguards the emperor; below, it wards off poison and harm, delivering the multitudes. In life and death, all depend upon it—its blessings are beyond measure, and thus it is called the boundless universal deliverance of heaven and humanity.

The Dao says: Whoever possesses these scriptures and performs such meritorious deeds for heaven, earth, the sovereign, and the multitudes—on the day of calamity, if they resolve in heart to perform purification rites, burn incense, and recite the scriptures ten times—shall have their names recorded by all the heavens, with ten thousand spirits attending in guard. Those distinguished as perfected ones shall thereby become ministers of the Golden Gates of the Sagely Lord. The heavens record the merits and transgressions of humanity without the slightest error. The demon kings of heaven shall also safeguard your person, and those who attain the Way shall come to comprehend these most profound teachings.

The boundless hidden speech of the Great Brahma in the heavens,
The Central Chapter of the Numinous Writ of the Primordial Beginning,
Composed by the Dao Lord of the Eastern Eight Heavens.

chunks.original_text: 亶娄阿苍，无和观音。 须延明首，法揽菩昙。 稼那阿奕，忽诃流吟。 华都曲丽，鲜菩育臻。 答落大梵，散烟庆云。 飞洒玉都，明魔上门。 无行上首，回跖流玄。 阿陀龙罗，四象吁员。 东方灵篆 叩齿九通，思九色之龙，导引从前后，青云九重，覆匝身形。 诵念密咒曰： 赤明开图，八炁回真。 总统元关，青帝大神。 流化九外，缠络我身。 灵音八书，六十四篇。 洞明天地，与我合仙。 运政龙驾，上升帝辕。 咒毕，引炁九咽止。 行之九年，八天各以青腰玉女、青华玉童各八人侍卫身形，致青灵九炁之精，主身光明，彻见虚无。 万遍道成，即得飞行，七祖同福，皆升南宫也。 南方八天南阎洞浮，玉眸诜诜。 梵形落空，九灵推前。 泽洛菩台，绿罗大千。 眇莽九丑，韶谣缘邅。 云上九都，飞生自骞。 那育郁馥，魔罗法输。 霐持无镜，揽姿运容。 馥朗廓奕，神缨自宫。 南方灵篆 叩齿三通，思朱雀、凤凰翻翔其前后，绛云三重覆匝身形。 诵密咒曰： 三炁徘徊，灵凤来飞。 玉音八字，烂焕紫微。 吉日大庆，我道洞开。 朱丹哺饴，仰吸灵晖。 身生水火，绛被羽衣。 登空飞步，足践凤梯。 周旋八天，七祖相通。 咒毕，引炁三咽止。 行之三年，八天各以太丹玉女、太阳玉童各八人，侍卫身形，降致朱丹三熙之精，反白留容。 万劫不倾，七祖超升，上入福堂。 反胎仙家，即得更生矣。 西方八天 刀利禅猷，婆泥咎通。 宛薮涤色，太渺之堂。 流罗梵萌，景蔚萧嵎。 易邈无寂，宛首少都。 阿褴郁竺，华漠延由。 九开自辩，阿那品首。 无量扶盖，浮罗合神。 玉诞长桑，栢空度仙。 西方灵篆 叩齿七通，思白虎、狮子导引左右，素云七重覆匝身形。 次诵念密咒曰： 七炁金灵，八天尊神。 白虎策辇，狮子捧辕。 七炁缠绵，炼我成仙。 身登金光，映照素云。 内外变化，升入洞门。 七祖出夜，九幽旋魂。 亿劫开度，随运长存。 咒毕，引炁七咽止。 行之七年，八天各以素灵玉童八人侍卫身形，降致太素七炁之熏，停年留世，万劫童颜。 及七祖升度南宫，反胎更生，世世仙家。 北方八天 玃无自育，九日导乾。 坤母东覆，形摄上玄。 陀罗育邈，眇气合云。 飞天大丑，总监上天。 沙陀劫量，龙汉瑛鲜。 碧落浮黎，空歌保珍。 恶奕元品，洞妙自真。 元梵恢漠，幽寂度人。 北方灵篆 叩齿五通，思飞龟羽盖蓊郁左右，黑云五重覆匝身形。 神童玉女羽衣飞裳，侍卫身形。 密咒曰： 天徘元徊，流景上清。

**Eastern Numinous Script**
Knock the teeth nine times, visualize the nine-colored dragons guiding before and behind, with nine layers of azure clouds enveloping the body.
Recite the esoteric incantation:
*"Vermilion Radiance unfolds the chart, the eight qi return to the True.
Governing the Primordial Pass, the Azure Emperor, Great Spirit.
Flowing transformation beyond the nine realms, entwining my body.
The numinous sounds of the Eight Scripts, sixty-four chapters.
Penetrating heaven and earth, uniting with me in transcendence.
Driving the dragon-chariot, ascending to the imperial axle."*
Upon completion, draw in qi and swallow nine times.
Practicing for nine years, the eight heavens each dispatch eight azure-waisted jade maidens and eight azure-flower jade lads to attend the body, bestowing the essence of the nine azure numina. The body’s radiance shines through the formless void. After ten thousand recitations, the Dao is accomplished, and one gains the power of flight. Seven generations of ancestors share the blessing, all ascending to the Southern Palace.

**Southern Eight Heavens**
The Southern Yan-Dong-Floating Realm, where jade pupils gleam.
Brahma-forms descend from the void, the Nine Numinous Ones advance.
The Lotus Terrace of Ze-Luo, the vast green net of the great kalpa.
The distant and boundless Nine Uglies, the melodious chants winding on.
The Nine Capitals above the clouds, where flying life soars of itself.
Nayū’s lush fragrance, the demonic Mara’s dharma subdued.
Holding the mirrorless brightness, grasping posture and moving countenance.
Fragrant and resplendent, the divine tassels adorn the self-palace.

**Southern Numinous Script**
Knock the teeth three times, visualize the Vermilion Bird and phoenix soaring before and behind, with three layers of crimson clouds enveloping the body.
Recite the esoteric incantation:

The jade sounds of eight characters, blazing in the Purple Tenuity.
Auspicious day, great celebration—my Dao opens wide.
Crimson cinnabar and sweet nectar, I gaze upward to absorb the numinous radiance.
Body born of water and fire, clad in scarlet feathered robes.
Ascending the void in flying steps, treading the phoenix ladder.
Circling the eight heavens, seven generations of ancestors commune."*
Upon completion, draw in qi and swallow three times.
Practicing for three years, the eight heavens each dispatch eight Great Cinnabar Jade Maidens and eight Great Yang Jade Lads to attend the body, descending the essence of the three crimson luminosities. The complexion reverses to youthful whiteness. After ten thousand kalpas, it remains unaged; seven generations of ancestors transcend and ascend, entering the Hall of Blessings. Returning to the immortal lineage, one is reborn anew.

**Western Eight Heavens**
The Dao-Li Chan-You, the Po-Ni Fault-Passing.
The winding marsh’s purified hues, the hall of the vast and distant.
The flowing net of Brahma-sprouts, the radiant luxuriance of Xiao-Yu.
The distant and boundless, the silent—where the winding heads and young capitals dwell.
Alam and Yuzhu, the blossoming desert’s extended reason.
The nine openings discern themselves, the Anāpāna’s foremost.
The immeasurable supporting canopy, the floating net uniting with the spirit.
Jade saliva and long mulberries, the cypress void ferrying immortals.

Knock the teeth seven times, visualize the White Tiger and lion guiding left and right, with seven layers of white clouds enveloping the body.
Recite the esoteric incantation:
*"The seven qi of golden numina, the honored spirits of the eight heavens.
The White Tiger spurs the chariot, the lion bears the axle.
The seven qi entwine, refining me into an immortal.
Body ascending in golden light, reflecting the white clouds.
Inner and outer transformations, ascending into the cavern gate.
Seven generations of ancestors emerge from the night, the nine dark realms’ souls revolve.
After a hundred million kalpas, they open the path—following the movement, eternally preserved."*
Upon completion, draw in qi and swallow seven times.
Practicing for seven years, the eight heavens each dispatch eight White Numinous Jade Lads to attend the body, descending the fumigation of the seven qi of Great Simplicity. Age halts, and the worldly countenance remains youthful for ten thousand kalpas. When the seven generations of ancestors ascend to the Southern Palace, returning to the immortal lineage, they are reborn anew, generation after generation as immortals.

**Northern Eight Heavens**
The self-nurturing Juewu, the nine suns guiding Qian.
The Mother of Kun covering the east, her form embracing the upper mystery.
The distant and vast Tuoluo, the subtle qi merging with the clouds.
The flying heavens’ great uglies, overseeing the upper heavens.
The Shatuo kalpa-measure, the dragon’s Han radiance.
The azure vault’s floating Li, the empty songs preserving the precious.
The evil Yi’s primordial rank, the cavern’s wondrous self-truth.
The primordial Brahma’s vast desert, the secluded and silent ferry of humanity.

Knock the teeth five times, visualize the flying tortoise and feathered canopy flourishing left and right, with five layers of black clouds enveloping the body. Divine lads and jade maidens in feathered robes and flying garments attend the body.

chunks.original_text: 大有启运，八字高明。 飞天澄空，洞阴自生。 五炁缠绵，灌我身形。 冠带北单，受炼洞灵。 肾府北出，内外光精。 飞行三界，遨宴紫庭。 七祖同庆，欢乐劫龄。 七宝林中，反胎更生。 长夜出离，南宫记名。 黄箓白简，世世仙生。 咒毕，引炁五咽止，行之五年，八天各以太元玉童八人侍卫身形。 降致灵滋五炁之精，还年留景，保命三清，庆及七祖，世世仙生。 道言：此诸天中，大梵隐语、无量之音旧文字皆广长一丈。 天真皇人昔书其文以为正音，有知其音能齐而诵之者，诸天皆遣飞天神王下观其身，书其功勤，上奏诸天。 万神朝礼，地祇侍门。 大勋魔王，保举上仙。 道备克得游行三界，升入金门。 此音无所不辟，无所不禳，无所不度，无所不成。 天真自然之音也。 故诵之致飞天下，观上帝遥唱，万神朝礼，三界侍轩，群妖束首，鬼精自亡，琳琅振响。 十方肃清，河海静默，山岳吞烟，万灵振伏。 招集群仙，天无氛秽，地无妖尘。 冥慧洞清，大量玄玄也。 灵宝无量度人上品妙经符图卷下

The Great Possession Initiates the Movement, the Eight Characters Ascend in Brilliance.
The flying heavens clarify the void, the cavernous yin spontaneously arises.
The five qi entwine and coil, irrigating my form.
Crowned and girded with the Northern Unlined, receiving refinement from the cavernous numina.
The kidney palace issues forth to the north, inner and outer luminous essence.
Soaring through the Three Realms, roaming and feasting in the Purple Court.
Seven ancestors rejoice together, delighting in kalpa-long ages.
Within the Seven Treasures Grove, reborn through returning to the womb.
Emerging from the Long Night, names recorded in the Southern Palace.
Yellow Registers and White Tallies, immortals born generation after generation.
Upon concluding the incantation, draw qi and swallow five times, then cease. Practicing this for five years, each of the Eight Heavens dispatches eight Jade Lads of the Great Primordial to attend and guard the body.
They bestow the numinous essence of the five qi’s refinement, restoring years and preserving radiance, safeguarding life in the Three Clarities. Joy extends to the seven ancestors, immortals born generation after generation.

The Dao states: Among these heavens, the great Brahma’s hidden speech and the boundless sounds of ancient script were all a full *zhang* in length. The Heavenly Perfected Sovereign of Old inscribed these characters to establish the correct intonation. Those who know these sounds and can recite them in unison will have the flying heavens and divine kings descend to observe their form, record their meritorious diligence, and submit it to the heavens above. Myriad spirits pay homage, earthly numina attend at the gates. Great Merit Demon Kings advocate for their ascent as immortals. With the Dao perfected and attained, they may roam the Three Realms and ascend through the Golden Gate. These sounds repel all, exorcise all, deliver all, and accomplish all. They are the Heavenly Perfected’s natural sounds. Thus, reciting them summons the flying heavens to descend, while the Emperor from afar intones, myriad spirits pay homage, the Three Realms attend in reverence, and all demonic hordes submit. Ghostly essences perish of themselves, the jade-like resonance vibrates. The ten directions grow solemn and clear, rivers and seas fall silent, mountains and peaks swallow their mists, and all numina tremble in submission. Gathering the assembled immortals, the heavens are free of miasmic filth, the earth devoid of demonic dust. Profound wisdom illumines the cavernous clarity, the vast measure is profoundly mysterious.
